author: agkphysics
message:
[detection] use consistent dtype for Conditional and DAB DETR positional embeddings (#40300)

fix: use consistent dtype for sine positional embeddings

files.patch:
@@ -431,7 +431,7 @@ def gen_sine_position_embeddings(pos_tensor, d_model):
     pos_x = torch.stack((pos_x[:, :, 0::2].sin(), pos_x[:, :, 1::2].cos()), dim=3).flatten(2)
     pos_y = torch.stack((pos_y[:, :, 0::2].sin(), pos_y[:, :, 1::2].cos()), dim=3).flatten(2)
     pos = torch.cat((pos_y, pos_x), dim=2)
-    return pos
+    return pos.to(pos_tensor.dtype)
 
 
 def inverse_sigmoid(x, eps=1e-5):

@@ -338,7 +338,7 @@ def gen_sine_position_embeddings(pos_tensor, hidden_size=256):
         pos = torch.cat((pos_y, pos_x, pos_w, pos_h), dim=2)
     else:
         raise ValueError(f"Unknown pos_tensor shape(-1):{pos_tensor.size(-1)}")
-    return pos
+    return pos.to(pos_tensor.dtype)
 
 
 def inverse_sigmoid(x, eps=1e-5):
